#include "../deptran/__dep__.h"
#include "server.h"
#include "../deptran/raft/server.h"
#include "client.h"

namespace janus
{
  const int TIMEOUT = 3 * 1000 * 1000;
  static int volatile x1 =
      MarshallDeputy::RegInitializer(MarshallDeputy::CMD_MULTI_STRING,
                                     []() -> Marshallable *
                                     {
                                       return new MultiStringMarshallable;
                                     });

  int64_t KvServer::GetNextOpId()
  {
    verify(sp_log_svr_);
    int64_t ret = sp_log_svr_->site_id_;
    ret = ret << 32;
    ret = ret + op_id_cnt_++;
    return ret;
  }

  int KvServer::Put(const uint64_t &oid,
                    const string &k,
                    const string &v)
  {
    string oidStr = to_string(oid);
    eventMap[oidStr] = Reactor::CreateSpEvent<IntEvent>();
    auto s = make_shared<MultiStringMarshallable>();
    uint64_t servIndex, servIerm;
    RaftServer &raftServ = GetRaftServer();
    Log_info("Initialised event");

    s->data_.push_back(to_string(oid));
    s->data_.push_back("put");
    s->data_.push_back(k);
    s->data_.push_back(v);

    shared_ptr<janus::Marshallable> ptr = s;
    // auto ptr = dynamic_pointer_cast<janus::Marshallable>(s);

    bool retMessage = raftServ.Start(ptr, &servIndex, &servIerm);
    Log_info("Start called with Put and oid %s", oidStr.c_str());

    if (retMessage == false)
    {
      Log_info("KV_NOTLEADER");
      return KV_NOTLEADER;
    }

    eventMap[oidStr]->Wait(TIMEOUT);

    Log_info("Wait done");

    if (eventMap[oidStr]->status_ == Event::TIMEOUT)
    {
      Log_info("timeout happens");
      return KV_NOTLEADER;
    }
    else
    {
      kvStore[k] = v;
      Log_info("KV_SUCCESS");
      return KV_SUCCESS;
    }
  }

  int KvServer::Append(const uint64_t &oid,
                       const string &k,
                       const string &v)
  {
    auto s = make_shared<MultiStringMarshallable>();
    string oidStr = to_string(oid);
    eventMap[oidStr] = Reactor::CreateSpEvent<IntEvent>();
    uint64_t servIndex, servIerm;
    RaftServer &raftServ = GetRaftServer();

    s->data_.push_back(to_string(oid));
    s->data_.push_back("append");
    s->data_.push_back(k);
    s->data_.push_back(v);
    shared_ptr<janus::Marshallable> ptr = s;
    // auto ptr = dynamic_pointer_cast<janus::Marshallable>(s);

    bool retMessage = raftServ.Start(ptr, &servIndex, &servIerm);
    Log_info("Start called with Append and oid %s", oidStr);

    if (retMessage == false)
    {
      return KV_NOTLEADER;
    }

    eventMap[oidStr]->Wait(TIMEOUT);

    if (eventMap[oidStr]->status_ == Event::TIMEOUT)
    {
      Log_info("timeout happens");
      return KV_NOTLEADER;
    }
    else
    {
      return KV_SUCCESS;
    }
  }

  int KvServer::Get(const uint64_t &oid,
                    const string &k,
                    string *v)
  {
    auto s = make_shared<MultiStringMarshallable>();
    string oidStr = to_string(oid);
    eventMap[oidStr] = Reactor::CreateSpEvent<IntEvent>();
    uint64_t servIndex, servIerm;
    RaftServer &raftServ = GetRaftServer();

    s->data_.push_back(to_string(oid));
    s->data_.push_back("get");
    s->data_.push_back(k);

    shared_ptr<janus::Marshallable> ptr = s;
    // auto ptr = dynamic_pointer_cast<janus::Marshallable>(s);
    bool retMessage = raftServ.Start(ptr, &servIndex, &servIerm);
    Log_info("Start called with Get and oid %s", oidStr);

    if (retMessage == false)
    {
      return KV_NOTLEADER;
    }

    eventMap[oidStr]->Wait(TIMEOUT);

    if (eventMap[oidStr]->status_ == Event::TIMEOUT)
    {
      Log_info("timeout happens");
      return KV_NOTLEADER;
    }
    else
    {
      if (kvStore.find(k) == kvStore.end())
      {
        *v = "";
      }
      else
      {
        *v = kvStore[k];
      }
      return KV_SUCCESS;
    }
  }

  void KvServer::OnNextCommand(Marshallable &m)
  {
    auto v = (MultiStringMarshallable *)(&m);
    string oid = v->data_[0];
    string operation = v->data_[1];
    Log_info("OnNextCommand operation - %s", operation.c_str());
    if (operation == "put")
    {
      string key = v->data_[2];
      string value = v->data_[3];
      kvStore[key] = value;
      Log_info("OnNextCommand Put, oid - %s, operation - %s, key - %s", oid.c_str(), operation.c_str(), key.c_str());
    }
    else if (operation == "append")
    {
      string key = v->data_[2];


      string value = v->data_[3];
      if (kvStore.find(key) == kvStore.end())
      {
        kvStore[key] = value;
      }
      else
      {
        string oldValue = kvStore[key];
        kvStore[key] = oldValue + value;
      }
      Log_info("OnNextCommand Append, oid - %s, operation - %s, key - %s", oid.c_str(), operation.c_str(), key.c_str());
    }
    if (eventMap.find(oid) == eventMap.end())
      return;
    eventMap[oid]->Set(1);
  }

  shared_ptr<KvClient> KvServer::CreateClient()
  {
    /* don't change this function */
    auto cli = make_shared<KvClient>();
    verify(commo_ != nullptr);
    cli->commo_ = commo_;
    uint32_t id = sp_log_svr_->site_id_;
    id = id << 16;
    cli->cli_id_ = id + cli_cnt_++;
    return cli;
  }

} // namespace janus;
